name: Mystic Village
description:
Build a village and watch the traveling spirits chill there :) There's no objective (yet!) besides making a cozy island.

Take a picture of what you build (camera button in game) and post it in the comments!

I'm actively working on this game and need your help to decide what to add next!

- More objects?

- More interesting spirit interactions?

- Something entirely different?

Please leave a comment!

--- 

follow @AuntyGames for updates!
